SELECT t.TEAM_NO, t.USER_NO, p.PIC_PATH, t.TEAM_INTRO, t.TEAM_NAME, t.TEAM_ADDCHK, u.USER_ID FROM (SELECT TEAM_NO, USER_NO, TEAM_INTRO, TEAM_NAME, TEAM_ADDCHK, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TEAM_NO DESC) AS rNum FROM TEAM_INFO WHERE 1=1
) t LEFT JOIN TEAM_PIC p ON t.TEAM_NO = p.TEAM_NO LEFT JOIN USER_INFO u ON t.USER_NO = u.USER_NO WHERE rNum BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY TEAM_NO DESC
